titleStmt.title: Robert Hammond et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5423

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: We the undersigned citizens of the county aforesd state that we have been acquainted with the petitioner for many years we know his habits in life, as well as his condition and ability to support his family; and we do most cordially join in the prayer of the petitioner that the fines may be remited and as in duty we will every pray.

Petitioners Names.
Robert Hammond
James Bullard
John Rhodes
Wm Gard
J T Eastham
Thomas Tuflett
William Abram
Squire Owens
Benjamin Rice
L T Blurdett
T A Newman
R Adams
J R Hold G C 1st Ky
Jerry Shay
Bartram
John Hally
John Steer
Petitioner Names
C. M. Brammer of G C
R. Selbe
Wm
ron Lewis
Edwd Courtney
Wm Aurther
W D Creery
H B Bridges county judge
Joseph P Rankin
Samuel Bartrum
Thomas Hally
